languages.text: {n}Умирающий враг хрипит, булькает, захлебываясь кровью, под фенрисийской сталью скрипят разрезаемые сухожилия и трещат перепиливаемые кости. Ноги хелбрута начинают подкашиваться, но, кажется, будто спесь и гордыня не дают изменнику рухнуть на колени. Еретик остается в живых достаточно долго, чтобы сполна вкусить муки, когда же Ульфар завершает экзекуцию, в руке он сжимает окровавленный рог, торчавший из головы почитателя Хаоса. Волк быстро вырезает на нем охранительную руну и гордо заявляет:{/n} "Славный трофей!"

{n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Умирающий враг хрипит, булькает, захлебываясь кровью, под фенрисийской сталью скрипят разрезаемые сухожилия и трещат перепиливаемые кости. Ноги хелбрута начинают подкашиваться, но, кажется, будто спесь и гордыня не дают изменнику рухнуть на колени. Еретик остается в живых достаточно долго, чтобы сполна вкусить муки, когда же Ульфар завершает экзекуцию, в руке он сжимает окровавленный рог, торчавший из головы почитателя Хаоса. Волк быстро вырезает на нем охранительную руну и гордо заявляет:{/n} "Славный трофей!"

The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

languages.text: {n}奄奄一息的地狱兽发出了咕噜咕噜的声音。尽管它的腿抽搐着，但却依然站在原地，仿佛出于纯粹的傲慢，而不肯倒下一样。乌尔法手中挥舞着芬里斯钢制成的利刃，切断了它的筋腱，锯断了它的骨头，但却并没有了结它，而是让它活了很长时间，足以充分品尝痛苦的滋味。当乌尔法站起身时，他手中握着一根鲜血淋漓的长角，是从地狱兽的头上拔下来的。他迅速在角上刻下了一个保护符文，自豪地宣布道。{/n}“多么光荣的战利品啊！”
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}奄奄一息的地狱兽发出了咕噜咕噜的声音，鲜血呛得它喘不过气来。乌尔法手中挥舞着芬里斯钢制成的利刃，切断了它的筋腱，锯断了它的骨头，但却并没有要了它的命，而是让它活了很长时间，足以充分品尝痛苦的滋味。当乌尔法站起身时，他手中握着一根鲜血淋漓的长角，是从那个混沌的崇拜者头上拔下来的。乌尔法迅速在角上刻下了一个保护符文，自豪地宣布道。{/n}“多么光荣的战利品啊！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}死にゆく敵は枯れた声で叫び、ごぶごぶと喉が血で詰まる音がする。フェンリスの戦士の剣で切られた腱がブチリと、断たれた骨はパキリと音がする。ヘルブルートの脚は歪み、折れたものの、未だ傲慢であるかのように直立している。すべての苦痛を受け入れられるほど、異端者の息は続いている。それからウルファーは立ち上がり、彼は渾沌崇拝者の頭から突き出た血塗れの角を握っている。ウルファーはその角に素早く保護のルーンを刻むと、高らかに宣言する。{/n}「栄冠の戦利品だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}死にゆく敵は枯れた声で叫び、ごぶごぶと喉が血で詰まる音がする。フェンリスの戦士の剣で切られた腱がブチリと、断たれた骨はパキリと音がする。すべての苦痛を受け入れられるほど、異端者の息は続いている。それからウルファーは立ち上がり、彼は渾沌崇拝者の頭から突き出た血塗れの角を握っている。ウルファーはその角に素早く保護のルーンを刻むと、高らかに宣言する。{/n}「栄冠の戦利品だ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}El enemigo moribundo carraspea y farfulla, ahogado en sangre, mientras se rompen sus tendones cercenados y sus huesos serrados crujen bajo el acero fenrisiano. Las piernas del Bruto Infernal se doblan, pero se mantiene en pie sustentado por su arrogancia. El hereje vive lo suficiente para sufrir la agonía y, cuando Ulfar termina, tiene en su mano el cuerno ensangrentado que sobresalía de la cabeza del adorador del Caos. Ulfar inscribe rápidamente una runa protectora en él y proclama con orgullo:{/n} «¡Un trofeo glorioso!».
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El enemigo moribundo carraspea y farfulla, ahogado en sangre, mientras se rompen sus tendones cercenados y sus huesos serrados crujen bajo el acero fenrisiano. El hereje vive lo suficiente para sufrir la agonía y, cuando Ulfar se levanta, tenía en su mano el cuerno ensangrentado que sobresalía de la cabeza del adorador del Caos. Ulfar inscribe rápidamente una runa protectora en él y proclama con orgullo:{/n} «¡Un trofeo glorioso!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'ennemi mourant râle et s'étouffe dans son propre sang, tandis que l'acier fenrissien tranche ses tendons et cisaille ses os. Ses jambes cèdent sous son poids, mais il parvient néanmoins à rester debout, comme porté par la seule force de son arrogance. L'hérétique survit assez longtemps pour subir pleinement son châtiment, et une fois son œuvre terminée, Ulfar tient dans sa main la corne sanglante qui ornait la tête de l'adorateur du Chaos. Il grave alors une rune de protection à sa surface et proclame fièrement :{/n} « Voilà un trophée glorieux ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ennemi mourant râle et s'étouffe avec son propre sang, tandis que l'acier fenrissien tranche ses tendons et cisaille ses os. L'hérétique survit assez longtemps pour subir pleinement son châtiment, puis Ulfar se relève en tenant dans sa main la corne sanglante qui ornait la tête de l'adorateur du Chaos. Il grave alors une rune de protection à sa surface et proclame fièrement :{/n} « Voilà un trophée glorieux ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der sterbende Feind keucht und röchelt, ertrinkt am eigenen Blut, während der fenrisische Stahl Sehnen schnalzend durchtrennt und Knochen knackend zersägt. Die Beine des Höllenschlächters knicken ein, doch es gelingt ihm irgendwie, stehenzubleiben, wie aus schierer Arroganz. Der Ketzer lebt lang genug, um vollständig an den Qualen teilzuhaben, und als Ulfar sein Werk vollendet, hält er das blutige Horn in der Hand, das eben noch aus dem Kopf des Chaos-Anbeters geragt hatte. Ulfar ritzt flink eine Schutzrune hinein und verkündet dann stolz:{/n} "Eine glorreiche Trophäe!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der sterbende Feind keucht und röchelt und schluckt Blut, während der Fenris-Stahl Sehnen durchtrennt und Knochen zersägt. Der Ketzer lebt lange genug, um das ganze Ausmaß der Agonie zu erleben, und als Ulfar sich aufrichtet, hält er das blutige Horn in Händen, das der Chaosanbeter auf dem Kopf hatte. Ulfar schnitzt rasch eine Schutzrune hinein und verkündet stolz:{/n} "Eine glorreiche Trophäe!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yavaş yavaş can veren düşman, bağırıp çağırıyor. Parçalanan tendonları koptukça, kesilen kemikleri Fenris çeliği altında ezildikçe kendi kanında boğuluyor. Tamu Kaçkını'nın bacakları kıvrılsa da âdeta gururuna yenilmezmişçesine dik duruyor. Kâfir, acıyı sonuna kadar deneyimleyecek kadar uzun yaşıyor. Ulfar, işi bittiğinde Kaosçu'nun başından çıkıntı yapan kanlı boynuzu sıkıca kavrıyor. Üzerine hızlıca koruyucu bir rün kazıdıktan sonra gururla bağırıyor.{/n} "Şanlı bir ganimet!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dying enemy rasps and gurgles, choking on blood, as severed tendons snap and sawed bones crack under the Fenrisian steel. The Helbrute's legs buckle, but he somehow remains upright, as if out of sheer arrogance. The heretic lives long enough to fully partake of the agony, and when Ulfar finishes, he is clutching the bloody horn that protruded from the Chaos worshipper's head. Ulfar swiftly carves a protective rune into it and proudly proclaims,{/n} "A glorious trophy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Can veren düşman bağırıp çağırıyor, parçalanan tendonları koptukça ve kesilen kemikleri Fenris çeliği altında ezilirken kendi kanında boğuluyor. Şuursuz'un bacakları kıvrılsa da âdeta gururuna yenilmezmişçesine dik duruyor. Kâfir, acıyı sonuna kadar deneyimleyecek kadar uzun yaşıyor. Ulfar, işi bittiğinde Kaos mensubunun başından çıkıntı yapan kanlı boynuzu sıkıca kavrıyor. Üzerine hızlıca koruyucu bir rün kazıdıktan sonra gururla bağırıyor:{/n} "Şanlı bir ganimet!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
